title: Starting the Game
body:
mBreak is a fun game for everyone - even your pets! Yes, goldfish, dogs, cats, sharks - every single soul on the planet will enjoy this wonderful game! It has paddles, and balls! Yes, fucking BALLS! HOLY SHIT!

These balls can even catch fire. FUCKING FIRE, AAAHHH, IT BURNS SO MY SKIN! MY PRECIOUS, PEARLY WHITE, GLORIOUS SKIN!
